name: Vortex Crashers
description:
We made this for an end of year project thing for EARTSUP Lille in 2020, and I'm now getting around to uploading it

The goal was to take a game from the 80s/90s that wasnt 3D or a RPG and add a new gameplay mechanic to it.

We took contra and added a dash / projectile absorbing mechanic, and made it a rogue lite as well because why  not.

It's far from perfect  (some spaghetti code, no difficulty scaling,  only 1 level that repeats), but it got us a pretty damn good grade.

This can be played with 1 or 2 players
You need a controller to play the game (Xbox, switch pro controller, PS4 controller,  a bunch of controller should work fine)
